topoptlab.log_utils module

class topoptlab.log_utils.WindowsLogging(file)[source]

Bases: object

Simple class to allow logging on Windows as there the logging module continues running in the background even after the program has finished. This can probably be avoided by calling python from the command line, but to my experience nobody does this but runs it in some IDE.

topoptlab.log_utils.init_logging(logfile)[source]

Initialize the logging and returns a function for the specified logging

Parameters:

logfile (str) – name of logfile.

Returns:

logging_function – Returns the function used to write information to logfile.

Return type:

callable
